Function.Description: The trim function removes the trailing, leading and extra spaces in a String.

Brief.Overview: The trim function removes any leading or trailing spaces from a String or Text, and removes extra spaces from a Text or String, leaving one space separating each word.
Brief.Usage: The trim function is used to remove excess spaces from a String or Text.

Argument.Name: string
Argument.Note: Any String or Text or cell or cell reference that evaluates to a String or Text for which you want to trim extra spaces.
